name: pomegranate production | pomegranate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20536/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of fresh Pomegranate which is a peripheral crop harvested in May, 2016 at a farm located in village- Vadner Bhairav  and District- Nashik of Maharashtra. The farm has a yield of 60,000 kg fresh matter per ha for this crop cycle. Harvesting date is 15-May, 2016. Mineral NPK fertilizer input is 54.68-89.69-166.25 kg/ha. Micro/macro nutrients applied are Mg 135.47 kg/ha, Zinc 54.26 kg/ha, Borax 51.67, Manganese sulfate 27.13 kg/ha, Portafer 72.34 kg/ha, and Sulfite 103.62 kg/ha. Organic fertilizer applied amounts to 9000 kg of manure from Local mix slurry. Fungicides used has active ingredient as Carbendazin 750g/ha, Mancozeb 6187.5g/ha. Insecticides used has active ingredient as Dimethoate 900g/ha, Dichlorovos 2280g/ha, Chlorpyriphos 450g/ha, Imidacloprid 267g/ha. Other pesticide used is plant based horticultural oil (neem and Karanj) 15.19 kg/ha. Machinery is used for Pesticide spray with fuel consumption of 6.24 kg/ha and for Nutrient spray with fuel consumption of 18.72 kg/ha. 

This is a perennial crop with periodic harvesting


The activity ends with the harvesting of the mature Pomegranate from the tree.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/012:Growing of perennial crops/0124:Growing of pome fruits and stone fruits

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Harvesting date main crop: 15-May, 2016. The cycle of one year is considered for entry in ecoeditor.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: village- Vadner Bhairav  and District- Nashik of Maharashtra
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Cultivation of Pomegranate follows conventional production standards
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Ecoinvent LCI calculation tool for crop production was used to calculate field emissions from the cultivation process.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The farmer was identified and contacted by agriculture science faculty through agriculture consultant familiar with the local farmers in the region. Data was collected directly from the farmer through semi-structured interview using a questionnaire based on the input requirements of the ecoinvent LCI calculation tool for crop production. Supplemented with information collected from farming community of the area.

exchanges.description: Calculated Value. This value has been calculated by using the ecoinvent LCI calculation tool for crop production.
Calculated Value. This value has been calculated by using the ecoinvent LCI calculation tool for crop production.

Total amount of active substance/s of fertilisers needed for the production of 'pomegranate' is calculated to be circa 2.23E-02 kg. Fertiliser/s used in this dataset is/are: 'dolomite', 'nitrogen fertiliser, as N', 'phosphate fertiliser, as P2O5', 'potassium sulfate, as K2O'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of fertiliser/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 4.46E-02 kg of packaging for fertilisers is justified with this exchange.

Therefore, 1.36E-02 kg of packaging for pesticides is justified with this exchange.
